FAIL_TO_PASS: when showGlobalOptions:true and nested commands then combined nested options shown program last
when showGlobalOptions:true and nested commands then return combined global options
when option hidden then not visible
when not enough width then no wrap
when add option then visible (with help)
when unsorted then options in order added
end-to-end: when option description is preformatted then manual format is preserved
when set width 12 (too small) then skip wrap
